PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-05732014-05-15,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Motor Vehicle Expenses and Benefits 2014)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (MOTOR VEHICLE EXPENSES AND BENEFITS 2014) in order to ensure the rates and limits remain appropriate and reflect changes in the costs associated with acquiring, financing and operating an automobile for business purposes for 2012, 2013 and 2014.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0118 Publication Date: 2014-06-04
AttachmentsAttachment
